item.title: FOSS List
item.description: Everything listed work on Windows, macOS and Linux. Web Browser Vivaldi Firefox Brave General HackMD (online collaboration) LibreOffice (office suite) Marktext (Markdown editor) Syncthing (P2P synchronisation between devices) Xplorer (file explorer) ImageGlass (image viewer) VLC Media Player (media player) 7-Zip (file compressor and extractor) Communication Element Rocket Chat Jitsi Meet Revolt Scorewriter MuseScore Frescobaldi (Lilypond) DAW Ardour LMMS Zrythm Graphic Krita Inkscape GIMP Darktable Blender Video Shotcut Kdenlive Misc OBS Studio Rustdesk Audacity KeePass Nextcloud

item.title: 天空
item.description: 好久沒親眼望見完整的天空了。一百多天來，幾乎每天都窩在家裡，依陽光從窗戶照進的角度、光量、顏色驅動生理時鐘。除了需要面對鏡頭的時間以外，時間好像只要以小時計算就已足夠。

item.title: About
item.description: Open Source advocate. Composer. Programmer. Pro-gamer. Living somewhere around (24°N, 121°E) on earth. Linux Tried various distros since 2018, including Ubuntu, elementary OS, Linux Mint, Zorin OS, Ubuntu Studio, AV Linux, Feren OS, KDE neon, Regata OS, MX Linux, Nitrux, Manjaro, Arch Linux, Archcraft, Garuda Linux. Now live on Manjaro KDE. Open source Aside from Linux, FOSS (Free and open source software) ensures the freedom of people to communicate, compute, create, etc.
一如往常，晨曦又為新的一年拉開序幕。平常不過的一天因格里曆成為數十億人熬夜的理由，只為了在時鐘歸零的剎那送出無數個新年快樂。如同世上幾乎所有的傳統節慶，對都市裡的人們來說最重要的不是節日本身的意義，而是一個向親友傳達祝福、聯繫感情的理由。

item.title: 中秋
item.description: 星垂平野闊 月傍九霄多 塵匣元開鏡 有淚如金波

item.title: 居
item.description: 滅燭憐光滿 返影入深林 人生不相見 山月照彈琴

item.title: 時
item.description: 柳邊人歇待船歸 鄉音無改鬢毛催 勸君莫惜金縷衣 古來征戰幾人回

item.title: 三十三
item.description: 早歲那知世事艱 自謂深根百世安 如今悔恨將何益 蠟炬成灰淚始乾
